description:
In this course you will learn the skills necessary to stand out in a social screening process by an employer, professionalize your online profile, target the right employer, get the interview and perform effectively in the interview. You will walk away with:

  • Career marketing tools necessary to get noticed online and get the attention of recruiters
  • Strategies for getting the interview
  • Specific approaches to responding to difficult questions in any interview format


Ace the interview and get the job you always dreamed of!

There is so much to stay on top of when looking for that next ideal job. You need to know what to expect, what questions employers may ask, what technology you may encounter in the interview and how recruiters are changing the way they meet and screen you.

Who better to learn from then someone who is speaking to employers every day, assisting them in streamlining their recruiting and interviewing processes, and developing and distributing some of the most innovative interview technology currently being used in the interviewing process today, in particular video
title: Interviewing skills bootcamp for smart job seekers!
